extendedInfo.description: Atom All in One WidgetsThe Art of Minimalism, Atom Launcherâs Exclusive Widgets.These Widgets are fully compatible with âAtom Launcherâ. Clock, Memo, Calendar, Contact and Settings widgets are included all together in one package.Atom All-In-One WidgetsClock: 4 types of analog and digital clocks, offering various colors and designsCalendar: Daily type(1x1), Monthly type(2x2) â includes holiday information Settings Widget: WiFi, Bluetooth, GPS, Sound, Rotation, Settings SwitchesContact: Icon type - Direct Message and Call keys, Memo: Various Memo sheets, Colors and DesignsIntegrated Google Search Bar*** Attention- Available for Android OS version 4.0.2 and up- The application needs 10 MB in total to save theme resources- To enhance usability, the installed theme doesnât appear- Not Available for Tab devices (X-large screen)*** Customer SupportPlease leave reviews or comments. Your review is greatly appreciated. For more information or support, please visit - Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/atom.themes- CS E-mail: atom.launcher@dlto.co.kr

reviews.title: Overall, awesome
reviews.comment: A very nice launcher, attractive and seems to be well featured. Loving it so far.
reviews.author: Scott M

reviews.title: widget missing
reviews.comment: Why can\'t I find any weather widgets for atom widgets?..If there is where can I look for it and if there is none please do something about it coz im using atom launcher and its just soo good but yeah i still need that weather widget..thnx and more themes pls..
reviews.author: pogi ako

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: I love your widgets. great!  Maybe you can add battery indicator which also allow battery status to be shown on the notification bar :)
reviews.author: Eileen Ho

reviews.title: Features Missung
reviews.comment: I gave it a 1 star cause I loved the app drawer arrangement that was like go launchers app drawer which I loved to see another launcher emulate I.E. Sort Most Used,  Running Apps etc,  I decided to try Atom again once more and those features are gone,  no thanks guess I\'ll stuck to go launcher then.
reviews.author: Xhris Dicken

reviews.title: Nice launcher
reviews.comment: A nice one! 4 stars because it still needs more icons, widgets, and themes. Please give some more updates.
reviews.author: Kian Susetio

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: on the settings widget will be good to have data traffic button and airplane mode button :) and its the best launcher that i ever use.. super fast and simple... weather widget will be nice too( separated from the clock widget ofc)

reviews.title: best launcher ever !!!
reviews.comment: i have been using go ex for almost a year and half but after using this no more go ex for me. is there any possibility of adding data and auto brightness button to widgets and uninstall the apps from main menu like on go ex ? i would be really nice to have those 2 features. thanks alot for the launcher.
reviews.author: ilk klv

reviews.title: i cant open my gallery..
reviews.comment: it seems like the only problem with the apps nor the themes, it seems like whenever i\'ve tried to open my gallery it wont even load or open my picture gallery.. 3stars for this.. i will try again but if all the themes i cant open my gallery i will uninstall this..  anyway it is a great apps ever..  Samsung III clans..
reviews.author: Shane Radam

reviews.title: Nice.
reviews.comment: Would really like to see a weather widget or include in clock.  A nice rss feed widget would be awesome to.  Lol,  sure thats pushing it though.
reviews.author: Tim Morris

reviews.title: WOW!!!!
reviews.comment: Best ever home launcher I have ever tried. Lite n silky smooth. Keep it up.
reviews.author: Tr odyuo

reviews.title: Sick bro
reviews.comment: The only problem I\'ve encountered is the selecting of widgets on the widget screen is kind of glitchy when swiping back and forth...oh  and more masculine themes please if possible...Holla
reviews.author: christopher hillyer

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: Some very stylish widgets, although one or two need a bit more customisation. And maybe add in a few more different widgets would be awesome
reviews.author: Blake Middleton

reviews.title: Please add more widgets
reviews.comment: I love this launcher very much..and I will not change anymore..but I request if you will add more widgets..pls.thanks
reviews.author: Roselle Angkahan

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: I love atom launcher and your widgets are beautiful... I was wondering if you could add some functionality to your clock widgets... It would be nice if clicking on the clock would open the alarm settings... I know clock widgets from other vendors do this... Its a convenient feature.
reviews.author: Matthew Brady

reviews.title: Love it, but lacks one option.
reviews.comment: It lacks the DATA TRAFFIC option. I would like to use this option everytime there\'s no wireless for me to connect to. Please add that.
reviews.author: Haszariah Suaili

reviews.title: Wow from Go to Atom launcher
reviews.comment: Nice Job Dev I like it thanks..  Hope more theme coming..  For boys
reviews.author: gef nars

reviews.title: Best launcher ever
reviews.comment: The best launcher I tried (still using) so far. Keep up the good work fella. :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Lovely
reviews.comment: Its awesome launcher.....
reviews.author: Nitesh Kumar

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.comment: I\'ve used many launchers but Atom is the best of all.Its fast, easy & I think everyone will like to set it as default launcher after  they download it!
reviews.author: Boni Amin

reviews.title: Good except for the calendar
reviews.comment: It\'s just that... a calendar...  I need a planner!
reviews.author: Dexter Alfonso
